title: The New Game Mode Is Super Slow For Me
body: It's super laggy whenever i move the map. My ping is the same as always (Around 30) but when i move the screen, it takes like 5 seconds. I want to play the new mode because it's cool and i love the cyber punk aesthetic, but this lag makes it really difficult.

replies.body: Overcharge has got a lot of effects going on all at once, as well as having a lot of vents that hide vision and such. Due to this some players might see more performance issues than they're used to simply because the game mode is more intensive. Make sure you've updated your graphics drivers to the latest, and it might be best to give the [**FPS guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) a quick run through as well as making sure no background programs are running.
